<a id="AudioEffectReverb"></a>

# AudioEffectReverb

**Inherits:** [AudioEffect](AudioEffect.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Adds a reverberation audio effect to an Audio bus.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Simulates the sound of acoustic environments such as rooms, concert halls, caverns, or an open spaces.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Audio buses](../tutorials/audio/audio_buses.md)

- [Third Person Shooter (TPS) Demo](https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/2710)

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="AudioEffectReverb_property_damping"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **damping** = `0.5` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectReverb_property_damping)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_damping**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_damping**\ (\ )

Defines how reflective the imaginary room's walls are. Value can range from 0 to 1.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectReverb_property_dry"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **dry** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectReverb_property_dry)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_dry**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_dry**\ (\ )

Output percent of original sound. At 0, only modified sound is outputted. Value can range from 0 to 1.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectReverb_property_hipass"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **hipass** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectReverb_property_hipass)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_hpf**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_hpf**\ (\ )

High-pass filter passes signals with a frequency higher than a certain cutoff frequency and attenuates signals with frequencies lower than the cutoff frequency. Value can range from 0 to 1.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectReverb_property_predelay_feedback"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **predelay_feedback** = `0.4` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectReverb_property_predelay_feedback)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_predelay_feedback**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_predelay_feedback**\ (\ )

Output percent of predelay. Value can range from 0 to 1.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectReverb_property_predelay_msec"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **predelay_msec** = `150.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectReverb_property_predelay_msec)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_predelay_msec**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_predelay_msec**\ (\ )

Time between the original signal and the early reflections of the reverb signal, in milliseconds.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectReverb_property_room_size"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **room_size** = `0.8` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectReverb_property_room_size)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_room_size**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_room_size**\ (\ )

Dimensions of simulated room. Bigger means more echoes. Value can range from 0 to 1.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectReverb_property_spread"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **spread** = `1.0` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectReverb_property_spread)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_spread**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_spread**\ (\ )

Widens or narrows the stereo image of the reverb tail. 1 means fully widens. Value can range from 0 to 1.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AudioEffectReverb_property_wet"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **wet** = `0.5` [ðŸ”—](#AudioEffectReverb_property_wet)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_wet**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_wet**\ (\ )

Output percent of modified sound. At 0, only original sound is outputted. Value can range from 0 to 1.
